Description: Ostracon, fragment of the body of a red pottery vessel, the fabric is relatively coarse and mauve and black in section, the exterior is covered with self-slip and very faint traces of a number of lines of black-painted text.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (394392) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/394392)
